article: Christmas was coming. A lot of  _  were going to town. They hoped to  _  some vegetables, fruit and meat in the market. And then they were going to buy some  _  for their families. A bus came. They tried to  get on  . Robert, a strong young man, rushed in first. He occupied two  _  : one for his girl friend Mable and the other for himself. The bus started. Robert had a look  _  the bus. He saw a lot of people  _  there. There were some old men among them. He hurried to  close  his eyes. Mable found it and thought he felt  _  and asked, "What's wrong with you, dear?""  _  ,"answered the kind-hearted young man. "I can't bear to see the poor old men!"
